A Way to Give from sportsbookcomDear friends all of us have been horribly saddened by the events in New York and Washington DC this past Tuesday Our thoughts and prayers are with those who have suffered For those receiving this note we hope you are well and safely with your loved ones One way to help the victims of this tragedy is to go to redcrossshtml Please enter an amount you wish to donate to the Red Cross Disaster Relief Fund from your account Sportsbookcom will match your donation dollar per dollar Sportsbookcom will not realize any profits from money donated to the red cross fund Though we have all been shocked by this tragedy we urge you and your friends and family to remain calm Atrocities of this magnitude are committed by truly sick individuals not normal human beings As peoples shock turns to anger we have seen some incidents of violence Lashing out at visible minorities only serves to further the cause of those who have committed these foul acts We must save our anger for those individuals or parties who committed or planned these crimes Once again the link to donate to the Red Cross Disaster Relief Fund isredcrossshtml And we will match your donation dollar for dollar Sincerely The staff at sportsbookcom UNSUBSCRIBEWe respect your privacy you have received this email because you joined sportsbookcom or participated in one of our free contests If you prefer to not receive any more emails from us please let us know and we will permanently delete your name from our email list records You are subscribed as To unsubscribe please go to list Our automated List manager will process and confirm your request within hour
